comment: goal 1067 to 1018 6.6% 20srm (makes no sense with the ingredients), 25 ibu70% 13.5% 4.5% 6.8% 4.5%, 150 mash, neutral lager yeast, hops at 90, 60, 15 and end of boil,
took out the chocolate, was 4.5%, but it makes it too dark, upon review of other recipes i dont think it is needed
after i dropped the choc i took the base up to 11 (from 10.25), brings the SRM right to 20, where tit should be

BJCP does not mention any crystal in ingrediants, in flavor it says "some caramel notes may be present" complex rich multiness, toasty. sounds a lot like most german lagers of that color (marzen, vienna etc)
